name: Mother's Day Escapade
description:
Quick! You forgot your mother's day present again, you best not waste any time In this cringe and slapstick-humor platformer and rush to grab something quick! Spare no one and jump around on scaffolding, destroy cars! Anything to get a collection of adequate gifts for your mother and race back home to make it before the shutter stops you, do this or cry on the side of the street to be a sad sight. If you don't get adequate gifts, well you been warned ;)

Make it back to the start of the level, past the gate before time runs out in order to return home and show your Mother.
